item.description: Tabs # Tabs let you organize content by context, for example installation instructions for each supported platform. {{< tabs "uniqueid" >}} {{< tab "MacOS" >}} # MacOS Content {{< /tab >}} {{< tab "Linux" >}} # Linux Content {{< /tab >}} {{< tab "Windows" >}} # Windows Content {{< /tab >}} {{< /tabs >}} Example # MacOS MacOS # This is tab MacOS content.
